content: MagSafe is trash. Uses induction to charge and hold. Induction uses electricity to generate heat and a magnetic field. Which heat is very bad for this type of electronic device.

video_title: AirPods 4 Review: Which Ones To Get?
content:
I have a question, I use AirPods gen 1 and my ears fit it well but when I lean down my head while I study it falls off. I think AirPods 4 will do the same so is there anyone who uses or used AirPods Pro that can tell whether it falls of when you lean down your head or not? 

Cuz I think silicone can stick better but maybe with use it will do the same I need to know, thank you so much if anyone answers :)

video_title: AirPods 4 Review: Which Ones To Get?
content: Thanks Marcus. I tried the Pros but returned them. The silicon tips hurt my ears and I tried all the sizes. Currently using AirPods 3 but have lost the right one. May be time for  a new set.

These are MUCH better than AirPods 3. I even prefer their fit over AirPods Pro 2
I am watching this in my airpods 4 anc and they are great and fit perfectly on me and the anc is crazy good

unfortunately the weak bass is kind of a dealbreaker for me. even the Airpods Pro2's bass is too weak. I bought one pair for my gf, I tried them and got real disappointed with the severe lack of bass. Even my $60 aukey buds from like 7 years ago and redmi 4 pro have way stronger basses. I had Pro1 before and thought Pro2 was gonna improve the bass, but nope, still so weak I wanna cry.. now that airpods4 have even weaker bass than Pro2, I don't think it's gonna be sufficient for me.. which is a damn shame 'cause I really want open tip buds without the rubbers, and I like its microphone quality and the squeeze controls..
Wow how inventive the Apple team is! It took them eternity to put rubber tips on their AirPods.üòí
They fall out my ear .. bout to start using my pros again
Managed to get a pair for only $87 USD. Fit nicely and better sound than the OG AirPods I had.
when I put my Airpods 4 anc at first in office... I was like who turn off the AC, it took me couple of seconds to realize
I just got them but they don't stay in my ears. What  can I do?
Thanks gonna get these AirPods 4 tomorrow. Since my AirPods Pro (2019 gen) had unfortunately stopped working after having it for 4-5 years.

I just got the airpods 4 today and started watching Django on Netflix... Fck me they are insanely good. It's like the sound is coming from the entire room and not just in your ears. Did not expect this level of quality
Love that water bottle drop. Very funny

After purchase my first airpods 2nd generation
My music experience on a another level ‚ù§üéâ

These are so good
Build quality is something else. Sound and battery hasn't degraded at all and I'm so happy I went for a leather case for it (Vionentus if anyone's curious).

Hey Marquez, I'm not hear to start an argument, I'm just honestly curious; do you ever experience negative side affects from these airpods? There are folks around me who state that these cause cancer, or tumours of some sort. All the forums I've read and videos I have watched state that this a false idea, or at least that the data/studies do not say so. Great explanation of adaptive transparency. Thanks Marcus
3yrs later, still amazing!
I want to use these in combination with earmuffs while doing woodworking. Double protection.

The noise cancellation tech that you‚Äôre mind-blown about has been used on Electronic Ear Pro for a long time, mainly for construction or when you‚Äôre at the gun range. It‚Äôs both a microphone and noise-canceling ear plugs. 

I use Walker's Razor Slim Ultra at the range and it instantly reduces the loud gun bangs to a decibel you can handle without making you deaf to the smallest of sounds. In case folks weren‚Äôt aware.

At 2:49, Linus says the charging case doesn't have a pairing button, while in reality both AirPods 4 models have a capacitive button for pairing (and it works fine with Android devices). We‚Äôll adjust the video to reflect this information.
I never understood using air pods if you have an android. It‚Äôs like me with an iPhone using Galaxy Buds. Why would I ever do that?
The volume sliding in the pro 2 is a hit and miss anyway/
It's not unboxing...
Finally, a reviewer that does a handstand test

I‚Äôve never tried AirPods Pro but I‚Äôm actually pretty tired of buds and silicone tips. They either don‚Äôt seal properly, become uncomfortable, come out of place, you have to make sure to push them in properly whereas the non-pro without the tips, you don‚Äôt need to worry about any of that.
Just bought these and excited to try them out!
Your mileage may vary
Damn, the redness makes you look like a postal booth 2:20

Degrade in mic quality is a real issue. I am having to buy a new one as I use mine a lot for calls and people I speak to on these calls are complaining about bad audio. It happens more so with phone calls, but now it is happening with calls taken via laptop too.

video_title: AirPods 4 (ANC) vs. AirPods Pro 2 - Which Should You Buy?
content: I much prefer the older/a4 style for eat comfort. I've never liked ear phones with the rounder fit. Even back in the early 2000s. Im an android guy, but go for Airpods for that fit. The JBL ones are appealing too because they seem similar.
